TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi BrowserCapabilitiesCodeGenerator extends System.Object

summary.span: The class is used internally by the tool to parse .browser browser definition files and add browsers to the run-time collection of known browsers contained in the object.

span.span: The class is used internally by the tool to parse .browser browser definition files and add browsers to the run-time collection of known browsers contained in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa classe genera il codice sorgente per un assembly per il (classe), che, in fase di esecuzione genera specifiche della richiesta oggetti per essere accessibili pubblicamente tramite la funzione intrinseca di ASP.NET `Request.Browser` proprietà.This class generates the source code for an assembly for the class, which, at run time, produces request-specific objects to be publicly accessed through the ASP.NET intrinsic `Request.Browser` property.

summary.span: Used internally to coordinate the behavior of this class.

span.span: Used internally to coordinate the behavior of this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo scorre la cartella "Browser".This method first iterates through the "Browsers" folder. Chiama quindi , file che carica e analizza il codice XML contenuto in una raccolta di definizione del browser e inserisce le informazioni contenute al suo interno in una raccolta interna di browser.It then calls , which loads and parses the XML contained in a collection of browser-definition files and inserts the information contained therein into an internal collection of browsers. Viene quindi chiamato un metodo interno che genera l'errore compila il codice sorgente e registra un assembly nella global assembly cache per il oggetto.Then it calls an internal method which generates the source code compiles it, and registers it as an assembly in the global assembly cache for the object. Se necessario, questo metodo chiama quindi un metodo interno che è possibile riavviare il server Web.If necessary, this method then calls an internal method that restarts the Web server.

summary.span: Loads and parses the XML contained in a collection of browser-definition files and inserts the information contained therein into an internal collection of browsers.

span.span: Loads and parses the XML contained in a collection of browser-definition files and inserts the information contained therein into an internal collection of browsers.

exception.span: One of the browser-definition files does not have a root element named "browsers".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Uninstall() cil managed

summary.span: Removes the browser capabilities factory from the global assembly cache and deletes its strong name public key token file.

span.span: Removes the browser capabilities factory from the global assembly cache and deletes its strong name public key token file.

returns.span: if the browser capabilities factory was uninstalled from the global assembly cache; otherwise, .

span.span: if the browser capabilities factory was uninstalled from the global assembly cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questo metodo riavvia il servizio Web.This method restarts the Web service. La factory di funzionalità del browser è stato successivamente rimosso dalla global assembly cache, e viene eliminato il file di token chiave pubblica con nome sicuro.The browser capabilities factory is then removed from the global assembly cache, and its strong name public key token file is deleted. Il servizio Web viene riavviato nuovamente se la disinstallazione ha esito positivo.The Web service is then restarted again if the uninstall succeeds.
